ygData.subject: Plate Pricing
ygData.msgSnippet: Just want to say, when we are finally able to make plate (this isn t in the near future, mind you. Tailoring is probably next to be worked on after make
ygData.messageBody:
Just want to say, when we are finally able to make plate (this isn't in the near
future, mind you. Tailoring is probably next to be worked on after make poison,
and then probably tinkering or alchemy from what I've read all around), we
should only sell for 5 to 10 plat less than the magical plates are sold for. We
can't sell for NPC plate prices (people would just buy magical plate) but I
really don't want to shoot myself in the foot and have the same thing happen
with plate as it did to banded. Please, no flames, I know some of you will only
want 10 plat profit per piece, that's your right, and this is mine. This is what
I will be doing and I would hope if you're concerned over smithing, please do
the same. Plate will NOT be cheaper to make oneself (not only the 150 plat it
takes to get to banded, but all the time selling banded to get to making plate),
so we don't have to worry about that happening. Just gotta be competetive with
magical plates. Again, please no flames, I'm terribly sick of them, and I will
not respond. Please, if you're on my side, don't respond to any flames either.
Let the baby have his/her bottle.
-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM
